script.caption: A dimly lit, dust-filled university hallway.

dialogue.text: We're at the old university wing. This area hasn't been frequented in years.

script.caption: A portrait of the university's founding dean decaying on the wall.

dialogue.text: Dean Hughes, our university founder. They say his spirit haunts this place.

script.caption: A student studying late at night.

dialogue.text: Did you hear that? It sounded like an old typewriter...but this entire wing is supposed to be empty!

script.caption: Radke and Professor Walton exploring a decrepit classroom.

dialogue.text: Seems like it's stuck in time. Even the chalkboard hasn't been cleaned.
It's the ghost, still trying to complete his unfinished work.

script.caption: A fleeting apparition of Dean Hughes at the end of the hallway.
Gloria trembling as she is confronted by the ghost.

dialogue.text: I am who I once was. Seek the truth that lies beneath.

script.caption: Radke, Professor Walton and Gloria uncovering a secret chamber.

dialogue.text: There's a basement under the university. It isn't on any of the blueprints!

script.caption: The team discovering an old unfinished manuscript in the secret chamber.

dialogue.text: This manuscript... It's Dean Hughes' unfinished work. He can't rest until it's complete!

script.caption: Radke and team burning the midnight oil to complete the manuscript.

dialogue.text: We're almost there. I hope this helps him find peace.

script.caption: Dean Hughes' ghost looking transparent and weak.

dialogue.text: You've done it. My work is finished.
You are freed, Dean Hughes. Rest now.

script.caption: Spirit of Dean Hughes dispersing in the moonlight.
